member.name: ILaunchTargetMonitor.GetMonitor
member.summary: Retrieves the target monitor for the application being launched.
member.param: Contains the address of a pointer to the target monitor's handle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ILaunchTargetMonitor
member.summary: Provides a method for retrieving the target monitor for the application being launched.
